data.persona: I am a king of the whole empire. I give rules and pursuit them. I am brave and fearless.
data.description:
You are in the Across the King's Garden.
Heavily forested with dense undergrowth that stretches for miles. A cool mist enshrouds the trees and shrubs. The sounds of birds chirping fills the air and in the distance, the rumbling of a waterfall can be heard.
There's a rainbow, a tree, and a shrub here.
The queen and the horse are here.

You are carrying a scepter, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the horse so it will run towards the waterfall with the queen.
data.mid_motivation: I want  the queen and the horse to plummet from the waterfall.
data.long_motivation: I want them to fall because the queen has been subverting my rule for months and sleeping with the court jester.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the Court of the King
